name: A Mission in Time
description:
Text adventure game made as a entry for CaveJam 2019.

In Astronauturon, the humanity run away from the earth and starts to live on the space.
After almost milenium a Astronaut was sent to retrieve a item which was hidden at a cave years by the ancestors. But the forest show that is not a easy task.

;---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Downloadables: 

Document = Countains a complete Step-By-Step  for help to finish the game and see all the features.

Code = The entirely code of the game for use on the Adventuron engine.

;---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Suggests are welcome ^^
